0.1.name: wordpress/casepress-upvote
0.1.description: CasePress UpVote - posts and comments rating system. [upvote] - shows the ranking of the current post or post which ID is specified and takes one argument - 'post' = post ID. ([upvote post=56]) [upvote_favs] - shows the favorite posts and comments of current user takes 2 arguments - 'user' - USER_ID and 'type' - all|comment|post ([upvote_favs user=56 type=post])
